name: 小糸
text:
ひ、雛菜ちゃん
テスト、返ってきた……？
trans:
Hi-Hinana-chan,
did you get your test back...?

name: 雛菜
trans: Ah～ uh huh.

name: 雛菜
text:
小糸ちゃんはまた１番でしょ～？
すごいね～
trans:
You got first again didn't you, Koito-chan? 
That's amazing～

name: 小糸
text:
ま、まあね……！
このくらい…………
trans:
Y-Yeah...!
Well this much isー...

name: 小糸
text:
で、でも雛菜ちゃんだって
良かったでしょ……？
trans:
B-But, you did great too,
Hinana-chan...!

name: 雛菜
trans: Hmmm～?

name: 雛菜
text:
ま、雛菜
別に勉強きらいじゃないしね～
trans:
It's not like Hinana
hates studying like this～

name: 雛菜
trans: Ehhh～?

name: 小糸
trans: Ah...no, it's nothing!

name: 小糸
text:
雛菜ちゃんは勉強
好きじゃないのかと思ってた……
trans:
I just thought...
you really didn't like studying...

name: 雛菜
trans: Oh～? You didn't know～?

name: 雛菜
text:
けど小糸ちゃんだって
別にきらいじゃないでしょ？
trans:
Koito-chan was with me after all, 
I couldn't hate that～

name: 小糸
trans: It's that teacher...

name: 雛菜
trans: Ah～ the one from the other day.

name: 小糸
trans: ...A-Ahem!

name: 小糸
text:
ひ、雛菜ちゃん一緒に
テスト勉強してくれてありがとう！
trans:
H-Hinana-chan, 
thank you SO much for studying with me the other day!

name: 小糸
text:
雛菜ちゃんも
すっごく良い点だったね！
trans:
Hinana-chan got 
an amazing score too, huh!

name: 小糸
text:
わたし、高校生になって初めて
カフェで友達と勉強するようになったけど
trans:
Though it was my first time studying at a cafe
with friends since I started high school,

name: 小糸
text:
お、思ってた以上に捗るし、
すっごく楽しいんだ！
trans:
I made more progress than I thought! 
And it was SO much fun!

name: 雛菜
trans: ...Is that right～

name: 小糸
text:
きょ、今日はいちごのフラッペ、
雛菜ちゃんがごちそうしてね！
trans:
I'll treat you to
a strawberry frappe today, Hinana-chan!

name: 小糸
trans: ...L-Let's go!

name: 雛菜
trans: Ah, Koito-chan～...

name: 小糸
trans: ー*pant*...*pant*...

name: 雛菜
text:
も～……
こんな走らなくてもいいのに～
trans:
Geez～...
We really didn't have to run like that～

name: 小糸
text:
ご、ごめんね……
はぁ……わ、わたし……！
trans:
S-Sorry...
*pant* ...I-I...!

name: 小糸
text:
わたし、先生に
反抗したの初めて……！
trans:
I've never rebelled against a teacher 
like that before...!

name: 雛菜
text:
え～
さっきの反抗って言える～？
trans:
Eh～
You call that rebelling～?

name: 雛菜
text:
小糸ちゃんがひとりで
叫んでるだけだったけど
trans:
You were just yelling 
all by yourself, y'know～

name: 小糸
trans: W-Well...!

name: 雛菜
trans: ーHey, Koito-chan.

name: 雛菜
text:
あんなことでわざわざ
怒らなくていいよ
trans:
You really didn't have to
do all that for me～

name: 雛菜
text:
雛菜、さっきの先生の
名前も知らないし～
trans:
Hinana doesn't even know 
that teacher's name～

name: 雛菜
text:
中学校の時の先生とかも
もう誰も思い出せないし
trans:
Even the teachers from middle school, 
I've already forgotten them.

name: 雛菜
text:
どうせ学校で会わなくなったら
すぐに忘れちゃうよ
trans:
As soon as we leave high school, 
I'll forget these teachers too～

name: 小糸
trans:
...I-I see...
so that's how it is...

name: 小糸
trans: If that's the case then... I'm glad.

name: 雛菜
text:
あ～
けど、やっぱりだめかも
trans:
Ahhh～
But it wasn't all for nothing～

name: 小糸
trans: Huh...!

name: 小糸
trans: W-What do you mean?

name: 雛菜
text:
小糸ちゃんがすっごい怒ってて
面白かったな～って
trans:
I thought it was reaaally funny, 
getting to see Koito-chan so angry like that～

name: 雛菜
trans: I hope I never forget it!
